price_quote_sent: Bao gia cua quy khach da duoc gui, quy khach vui long kiem tra mail. Chan thanh cam on.
thank_you: Cam on Quy Khach Hang da ung ho Thiet Bi CN Binh Duong trong thoi gian qua. CN Binh Duong phan dau no luc hon trong thoi gian toi, de mang lai cho quy khach san pham tot nhat, gia ca canh tranh nhat. Su hai long cua quy khach hang la thanh cong cua chung toi.
price_quote_request: Yeu cau bao gia cua Quy Khach cong ty da tiep nhan, cong ty se lien he som nhat. Chan thanh cam on.
order_received: Don dat hang cua Quy Khach cong ty da tiep nhan, cong ty se lien he giao hang som nhat. Chan thanh cam on.
request_received: Cam on Quy Khach da quan tam san pham va dich vu tai Thiet Bi CN Binh Duong, yeu cau cua Quy Khach da duoc tiep nhan.
new_email_sent: Quy Khach co email moi tu Cty Thiet Bi CN Binh Duong. Vui long kiem tra email. Chan thanh cam on.
admin_price_request: Ban co yeu cau bao gia gui tu website CN Binh Duong. Vui long kiem tra email
admin_email_sent: Ban co email lien he moi gui tu website CN Binh Duong. Vui long kiem tra email.
